alert.note: Alert for Cimarron; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 6:00PM CDT until May 11 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Texas County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... Southeastern Cimarron County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... Northwestern Sherman County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northeastern Dallam County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 559 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles northwest of Conlen, or 17 miles west of Stratford, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Griggs and Conlen. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
